name: Ray & Stoic Gronk
description:
A techno-fantasy adventure brimming with eclectic characters, pulse-pounding acrobatics, and brutal combat. Guide our heroes as they travel across the vast continent of Marathon - filled with secrets, puzzles, and intimidating foes, each more fierce than the last. Along the way, gain new abilities, upgrade your skills, and fulfill your destiny as a true Dokken! 

  • Savage sword-swinging action
  • Unlock new abilities to aid in traversal and conquer your foes
  • Trample and pulverize foes in a giant mech
  • Test your skills against a legion of epic bosses
  • Upgrade your abilities with the blood of your enemies to become a true Dokken warrior.
  • Explore the land, conquer foes and solve puzzles to reveal the bevy of hidden treasures hidden across the continent of Marathon.
  • Engage in a captivating tale with unique locales, unique characters, and uncomfortable situations.

Two Heroes

Ray, a razor-sharp blade with an attitude to match. Under mysterious circumstances, he finds himself transformed into a sword and thrust into unknown territory. Ray’s only goal - get back home and regain his humanity.

Gronk is the last of an ancient race of warriors known as the Dokken. Culled to fulfill a pact by the Elders of the High Council, Gronk must reclaim the Capital and prevent Malice, a powerful warlock and leader of the savage Ragnar from releasing an ancient evil intent on destruction.

Join Ray and Gronk on a prolific quest through the continent of Marathon, as they work together to unite the Elders and prevent Malice from reincarnating an ancient evil that knows no bounds.

“Oh and I’d really like to get home and not be a sword anymore - I miss having lungs!” - Ray
